description.displayText:
I've known Ferrari for almost 12 years! She is caring, kind, patient and FUN! You're kids will not only be in safe capable hands, they will also be having a blast in her care! 
We met in college in the Theatre department so creativity abounds with her. Whether it's taking them to a museum near Central Park or having a rainy day crafts session at home she is the sitter for you. 
I recently had a baby and she has been instrumental in helping me get some rest as all Moms know ALL too well how difficult that is with a newborn. 
All in all, she is THE best!

description.displayText: Ferrari is fantastic with kids! (We have a 7 year old & an infant.) She is responsible & caring and is always up for playtime with the kids whether it be going to the park or crafts at home. We loved her!
